data.title: Can they smell your fart?
data.solution:
# Will they smell it?
distance = gets.to_f
fart_lifetime = gets.to_i
wind_speed = gets.to_f
diffusion_speed = gets.to_f

speed = wind_speed + diffusion_speed
travel_time = distance / speed

puts travel_time > fart_lifetime ? "Safe #{ travel_time.ceil }" : "Busted"
data.statement:
A friend is located at a [[distance]] from you. Accounting for [[wind_speed]], you need to figure out if you can fart safely, without your friend smelling it.

• You know that your farts can't be smelled after [[fart_lifetime]] seconds.
• You know the centre of the fart travels towards your friend at the [[wind_speed]] (m/s).
• You know the fart also diffuses to your friend at an additional [[diffusion_speed]] (m/s).

Print {{Busted}} if your friend smells your fart ([[travel_time]] <= [[fart_lifetime]]), or {{Safe #}} where {{#}} = [[travel_time]] is how many seconds the fart takes to reach your friend (rounded up to the nearest integer).

<<Note>>: [[wind_speed]] can be negative, meaning the fart will travel <<away>> from your friend, but the total speed will never be negative (i.e. the fart will always reach them eventually).

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

A friend is located at a distance from you. Accounting for wind_speed, you need to figure out if you can fart safely, without your friend smelling it.

• You know that your farts can't be smelled after fart_lifetime seconds.
• You know the centre of the fart travels towards your friend at the wind_speed (m/s).
• You know the fart also diffuses to your friend at an additional diffusion_speed (m/s).

Print Busted if your friend smells your fart (travel_time <= fart_lifetime), or Safe # where # = travel_time is how many seconds the fart takes to reach your friend (rounded up to the nearest integer).

Note: wind_speed can be negative, meaning the fart will travel away from your friend, but the total speed will never be negative (i.e. the fart will always reach them eventually).
Input
Line 1 : A float distance between your butt and your friend's nose, in metres
Line 2 : An integer fart_lifetime in seconds: the time before your fart becomes unsmellable
Line 3 : A float wind_speed in m/s: the speed the centre of the fart travels to your friend
Line 4 : A float diffusion_speed in m/s: the speed the fart grows away from its centre
Output
1 line : Busted if your friend will smell your fart before fart_lifetime, or Safe # where # = travel_time is the time it takes for the (now unsmellable) fart to reach your friend (rounded up).

Note: You are Busted if travel_time <= fart_lifetime
Constraints
0 < distance < 100
0 < fart_lifetime < 30
-10 < wind_speed < 10
0 ≤ diffusion_speed < 10

wind_speed + diffusion_speed > 0
Example
Input
1.0
5
0.2
0.0
Output
Busted
